verses.verse: When you go out <WH3318> to battle <WH4421> against your enemies <WH341>, and see <WH7200> horses <WH5483>, and chariots <WH7393>, and a people <WH5971> more <WH7227> than you <WH3372>, be not afraid of them <WH3068>: for the Lord your God <WH430> is with you <WH5927>, which brought you up out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>.
